pullRequest.title: [HUDI-1274] Make hive synchronization supports hourly partition
pullRequest.bodyText:
Tips

Thank you very much for contributing to Apache Hudi.
Please review https://hudi.apache.org/contributing.html before opening a pull request.

What is the purpose of the pull request
Make hive synchronization supports hourly partition
Committer checklist


 Has a corresponding JIRA in PR title & commit


 Commit message is descriptive of the change


 CI is green


 Necessary doc changes done or have another open PR


 For large changes, please consider breaking it into sub-tasks under an umbrella JIRA.

nodes.bodyText: This check can be removed, it is always true.
@liujinhui1994 Thanks for addressing my concern, LGTM now
If you try to support hourly partition, then this name is not suitable. WDYT?
IMO, we need to add more test cases to improve the test coverage. wdyt?
remove the / as well at the end where? And why check contains =? It would be better to add more description.
IMO, it would also be better to check the hive style partitions (good case and bad case). wdyt?
